                                                                                                               /*Code by fearless_coder*/
#include<stdio.h>
int a[10001];
int main()
{
	int t,n,i,c,s,r,j=1;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	while(n!=0)
	{
		s=0,c=0;
		if(n==0)break;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&a[i]);
			s+=a[i];
		}
		r=s/n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]>r)
			c=c+(a[i]-r);
			else if(a[i]<r)
			c=c+(r-a[i]);
			else if(a[i]==r)
			c=c+0;
		}
		printf("Set #%d\n",j);
		printf("The minimum number of moves is %d.\n\n",c/2);
		//printf("Set#%d\n",j);
		//printf("The minimum number of moves is %d.\n",c/2);
		scanf("%d",&n); 
		j++;
	}
}
